videoInfo.name: Growing Up in the City vs Countryside in Latin America - Intermediate Spanish
videoInfo.description:
*Watch on our website and get the full experience: https://drming.es/home*
üì∫ 6300+ videos across all levels and all kinds of topics.
üìà Sort and watch videos in order of difficulty (rated 1-100).
üîç Search and filter videos by level, accent, teacher, topic, and more.
‚è∞ Track your watch time AUTOMATICALLY.
üöÄ See how far you are in your Spanish learning journey!

Agustina was raised in the vibrant city of Buenos Aires, while Shel grew up in a quiet Colombian village. How different were their childhoods? Today, they share their stories.

*Discover our immersion-based method for learning Spanish: https://drming.es/method*
üß† Learn Spanish the same way you learned your native language. No grammar, just immersion!
üëâ Access 6300+ videos of Spanish comprehensible input on our website: https://drming.es/home

*Connect with us*
Meet our teachers: https://drming.es/teachers
Check out our blog: https://drming.es/blog
Read our FAQ: https://drming.es/faq
Donate to our project: https://paypal.me/DreamingSpanish

*Episode chapters*
00:09 Growing Up in the Countryside of Colombia
02:25 Growing Up in the City of Buenos Aires
04:06 Family Life and Work in a Rural Setting
06:07 Adjusting to City Life in Cartagena
07:21 The Reality of Rural vs. Urban Education
08:55 Different Childhood Experiences and Family Dynamics
18:25 Machismo and Gender Expectations in Latin America
20:57 Opportunities and Life Paths in the City vs. Countryside
23:12 Cultural Traditions and Social Challenges in Rural Areas
30:06 How Different Backgrounds Led to the Same Place
videoInfo.author: Dreaming Spanish
